name: Wmplayer
body:
### MacRuby MP3 Audio Player

This is a simple MP3 Audio Player using MacRuby and hotcocoa.

![MacRuby MP3 Audio Player](http://i.min.us/ijUvIi.png)

### Prerequisites

* MacRuby >= 0.6
* hotcocoa

### Running from source

    $ macrake run
    
  or
    
    $ macruby lib/application.rb

### Building WMPlayer.app

    $ macrake deploy
